reviewText: This box set contains 3 previously released operas in their original DVD cases, housed in a thin cardboard box. All operas are available on Amazon individually. THE OPERAS ARE: LE NOZZE DI FIGARO-Mozart (4.4 stars) 2006 Ildebrando D'Arcangelo is Figaro. Diana Damrau is Susanna. Pietro Spagnoli is Count Almaviva. Grard Korsten conducts. Excellent performances. Appropriate scenery and costumes. Some portions of the stage were not lit well enough for video. English subtitles seemed to be inaccurate at times. More information and Amazon customer reviews can be found here: Mozart: Le nozze di Figaro MARIA STUARDA-Donizetti (4.2 stars) 2008 Performance: 4.8 stars Staging: 3.0 stars Mariella Devia is Maria Stuarda. Francesco Meli is Roberto, Conte di Leicester. Anna Caterina Antonacci is Elisabetta II. Antonio Fogliani conducts. Excellent performances. Devia, about 60 years of age, sings an amazing Maria. The performances are degraded by the scenery. Throughout the entire opera the whole stage is a prison made of bars. It is a constant distraction. More information and Amazon customer reviews can be found here: Donizetti: Maria Stuarda - Orchestra & Chorus of the Teatro Alla Scalla SIMON BOCCANEGRA-Verdi (4.7 stars) 2010 Plcido Domingo is Simon Boccanegra. Ferruccio Furlanetto is Jacapo Fiesco. Anja Harteros is Maria/Amelia. Daniel Barenboim conducts. Excellent singing. Acting is sometimes excellent, sometimes just standing and singing. Some scenery is abstract. More information and Amazon customer reviews can be found here: Simon Boccanegra BOX SET DUPLICATION: The box set "The Verdi Opera Selection-Vol II" contains the same production of "Simon Boccanegra" that this set does. It is here: Verdi Opera Selection 2
